title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.3 - License required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.3 - License required

State Regulations

No entity shall sanction or hold a match, exhibition or
otherwise oversee or conduct a combative sport without having been authorized
to do so by the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
214.3

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
